meta.content: Decatur City Schools serves students and is located in Decatur, AL.

Power to the Schools Featured Photo

div.div:
Power to the Schools For just a dollar or more a month, you can make a powerful difference!
Make a donation each month on your utility bill to provide funding for ongoing technology needs such as equipment and teacher training.
Funds go directly to Decatur City Schools Foundation which gives 100% of Power to the Schools funding to public education in Decatur.
To support technology needs of Decatur City Schools, simply fill out and submit the form below and select "Power to the Schools". Your donation will begin with the next billing cycle and you may opt out at any time.

div.div: Great News! We have added 3 new additional Pre-K classes located at Austinville, Julian Harris, and Oak Park for the 2019-2020 school year. Click on the Enrollment tab and then click on the First Class Pre-K tab. Follow directions listed for the online registration process.

div.div: Decatur City Schools and Kelly Educational Staffing (KES) would like to announce their partnership in the management of substitutes for the 2019/2020 school year.
